alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 5:43PM MDT until October 26 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PDT THURSDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected ABOVE 2000 FEET. Total snow accumulations up to 1 inch, except up to 2 inches on the Camas Prairie. * WHERE...Gifford, Pullman, Uniontown, Nezperce, Tekoa, Lewiston Grade, Potlatch, Soldiers Meadow Road, Winchester, Craigmont, Moscow, Rosalia, Oakesdale, and Genesee. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 1 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. This may impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
